      :snt1 (s / sound-01
            :ARG1 (n / name
                  :mod (t / this))
            :ARG2 (n2 / name
                  :mod (p / porn)
                  :poss (y / you)
                  :ARG1-of (h / have-03
                        :ARG0 (w / we)
                        :time (h2 / high-school
                              :mod (j / junior)))))
      :snt2 (t2 / take-01
            :ARG1 (a / and

                        :op2 "Sunset")
                  :time (e / ex))))
